scripts.compile:lsp: pnpm run compile:lsp:deps:vscode && pnpm run compile:lsp:deps:vscode-eslint && pnpm run compile:lsp:css && pnpm run compile:lsp:css:bin && pnpm run compile:lsp:eslint && pnpm run compile:lsp:eslint:bin && pnpm run compile:lsp:json && pnpm run compile:lsp:html && pnpm run compile:lsp:html:bin
scripts.compile:lsp:css: cd extra/vscode/extensions/css-language-features && npm i && cd server && npm i && npm run compile
scripts.compile:lsp:deps:vscode: cd extra/vscode && npm i --ignore-scripts && cd build && npm i
scripts.compile:lsp:deps:vscode-eslint: cd extra/vscode-eslint && npm i --ignore-scripts && cd server && npm i
scripts.compile:lsp:eslint:bin: shx mkdir -p extra/vscode-eslint/server/bin && shx cp -f tpl/lsp-bin/vscode-eslint-languageserver extra/vscode-eslint/server/bin
scripts.compile:lsp:json: cd extra/vscode/extensions/json-language-features && npm i && cd server && npm i && npm run compile
scripts.compile:lsp:html: cd extra/vscode/extensions/html-language-features && npm i && cd server && npm i && npm run compile
scripts.init: pnpm run up && pnpm run init:hooks
scripts.up: mise use -g node@lts pnpm@latest && mise install && pnpm install
